name: Technical Sales Engineer (Display)
description:
Responsibilities:
  • Proactive manage and coordinate solution and technical feedback on Display Business (LCD Signage / LED Signage)
  • Support local sales team with technical issues
  • Develop and drive Display sales
  • Lead the technical aspects of CIS sales projects
  • Technical training to subs sales, partners and customers.
  • Support presales and post sales issues in on site end-customer and partner
  • Identify and solve issues in end customer environments
Requirements:
  • Technical Degree qualification preferred
  • Strong knowledge of IT - infrastructure management and IT department operations
  • Broad professional experience of minimum 3-5 years in LCD/LED signage products and solutions
  • Broad professional experience of minimum 3-5 years in IT department business operations from large environments
  • Strong communication skills in Russian and English
  • Good sense of urgency
  • Good understanding of the chain of sales and production
  • Willing to travel at least 2 or times per month if required
